definitions.meaning: (zoology) segment (of the body of a worm, centipede etc)

sentences.pinyin: Zhè tiáo chóngzi yǒu wǔ gè huánjié.

sentences.simplifiedText: 虫子的身体按照功能不同可以被分成多个环节。
sentences.traditionalText: 蟲子的身體按照功能不同可以被分成多個環節。
sentences.pinyin: Chóngzi de shēntǐ ànzhào gōngnéng bùtóng kěyǐ bèi fēn chéng duō gè huánjié.
sentences.translation: The body of a worm can be divided into several segments according to different functions.
